Directions: In a skillet, brown pork chops on both sides in oil; drain. Place chops in a slow cooker. Add the onion, green pepper and mushrooms. In a bowl, combine the tomato sauce, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, vinegar and salt. Pour over meat and vegetables. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours or until meat is tender. Serve with rice if desired.
Ingredients: 6 pork loin chops (3/4 inch thick), trimmed
1 (4 ounce) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained
